alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 4:27PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Juab and western Tooele Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 426 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles west of Utah Test and Training Range South to 12 miles northwest of Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge. Movement was northeast around 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range South, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range and Knolls. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 36 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
